sequence: <size=51>“...I thought... by defeating all of my enemies... I’d finally get some peace.”</size>
<size=51>“But it appears... the future has betrayed us.”</size>
<size=51>“No matter the effort, there will always be battles ahead.”</size>
<size=51>“One by one they stand defiant in front of me... and one by one their faces disappear behind me... I can’t remember them anymore.”</size>

scripts.say: Is this the area indicated by that mysterious signal... It appears that we were still too late.
This is too much, everything has completely turned into ruin.
Exactly who are these people... to be able to destroy the test field setup by the Sirens...
Could it be the Sakura Empire?
From the traces of weapons damage—— This doesn’t look like it was from the Sakura Empire or the Royal Navy... could this be... could this be from our weapons?
Argh!!! Such a thick fog of war!!!
No matter, whoever did this, they certainly saved us a lot of trouble. I really have to thank this “Mystery Man”.
Let’s explore the surroundings, see if we can collect any useful intel——
